metadata.name: !!~External item descriptions
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/l9nbaxP.png[/img] This mod displays detailed information about all items, trinkets, cards, runes and pills DIRECTLY onto your screen. Say goodbye to your browser tab with platinumgod or the wiki open ;)
The Steam-Workshop version of this mod is compatible with Afterbirth+, Repentance, Repentogon and Repentance+. There are also versions for [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions#versions]Rebirth or Afterbirth[/url], as well as [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki/How-to-install-the-mod]Epic Games, GoG and other sources[/url].
[img]https://i.imgur.com/bRGqujD.png[/img] [url=https://discord.gg/HhD4vMM4bZ]Need help or want to chat? Join our Discord server![/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/P6a8043.png[/img] [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions]Check this project out on GitHub![/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/QmqdAmr.png[/img] [list] [*] [b]Compatible with Afterbirth+, Repentance and Repentogon[/b] [*] Displays information for all collectibles, trinkets, cards, runes, pills, horsepills and some rooms [*] Displays [b]additional information[/b] like item type, charges, transformations, Spindown Dice results, Bag of Crafting recipes, TMTRAINER item effects (Detailed informations require REPENTOGON installed!), and much much more! [*] Mod support for nearly all mods! [*] Extended features available with [url=https://repentogon.com/]Repentogon[/url] [*] Easy to use API ([url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki]Documentation here[/url]) [*] A huge amount of custom options like: [list] [*] Indicators [*] Font styles [*] 17+ Languages [*] And a lot of visual options! [/list] [/list]
[b]Press F2 to hide/show the descriptions![/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NqSBJqj.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/mJshXnR.png[/img] Supported Languages: Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Brazilian-Portuguese, Turkish, Ukrainian
To change the language, just edit the config. We recommend [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]'Mod Config Menu Pure'[/url] for this.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/RVtZEqp.png[/img] For [b]Steam users[/b], simply press the "Subscribe" button on the mod's Steam Workshop page. This will automatically install the mod for you. For [b]manual mod installation[/b], read this tutorial "[url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki/How-to-install-the-mod]How to install the mod[/url]"
If you have problems installing use the [url=https://wofsauge.github.io/IsaacDocs/rep/faq/interactive_FAQ.html]Interactive FAQ[/url]. [img]https://i.imgur.com/PFTZnfC.png[/img] Simply install [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]'Mod Config Menu Pure'[/url]. You can use it to configure the mod while playing.
Alternatively, edit the `eid_config.lua` file like described [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki/Edit-the-configuration-manually]here[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vUP4whT.png[/img] There are multiple Versions of the mod, depending on which DLCs you have installed. [b]You are currently looking at the version for Afterbirth+ and Repentance.[/b]
[url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions#versions]Click here for the Rebirth or Afterbirth Versions[/url]
